name: Royalty Free (Demo)
description:
Official Tumblr

9/1/16: The full game has been released! Download it here!

Ever wanted to date a princess?

Now's your chance.

Royalty Free is a visual novel where you have the opportunity that not many people get: the opportunity to date a princess.

You play as Takahiro (default name, the player may type in any name they like), a new guard to the castle. He meets the five princess sisters, all with their own unique personalities, quirks, and interests: Utako, Aya, Shizuka, Hinata, and Mai.

Takahiro receives choices that will raise or lower each princess's affection towards him.

Which one will he fall in love with? Will it work out? Will he be happy with the girl?

That's all up to you.

Right now, I am in the "rewrite phase", where the writing and pacing is being improved, and maybe a few more scenes will be thrown in before I release the full game.

The game was written by me, Emily LaPerch (http://hatoheart.tumblr.com).

The character art was drawn by Viktoria Aleksandrova (http://viki-chii.deviantart.com)

The game was programmed using Ren'Py.

Any and all feedback/constructive criticism is highly appreciated, and will help me improve my game as best I can!
